title: CI build for Java 16-ea is broken
body:
The add of `16-ea` to the cross build workflow is breaking the build for PRs. It seems that `nl.jqno.equalsverifier` 3.4.2 does not support Java 16 class files.

https://github.com/joel-costigliola/assertj-core/pull/1980/checks?check_run_id=1032659339#step:5:2803

```
[INFO] Running org.assertj.core.api.recursive.comparison.FieldLocation_Test

[ERROR] should_honor_equals_contract  Time elapsed: 0.129 s  <<< FAILURE!
java.lang.AssertionError: 
EqualsVerifier found a problem in class org.assertj.core.api.recursive.comparison.FieldLocation.
-> Unsupported class file major version 60

For more information, go to: http://www.jqno.nl/equalsverifier/errormessages
```
